N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 ยง 541.3 - Hospital forensics committee

State Regulations

Each office facility shall establish one or more hospital
forensics committees. Each committee shall consist of three persons appointed
by the clinical director. Each member shall be a clinician licensed in New York

State to practice medicine, psychology or social work. At least one member of
the committee shall be a board-certified psychiatrist. At the request of the
treatment team prior to the expiration of an order of commitment, recommitment
or retention, the committee shall interview the defendant, review all clinical
records and submit findings and recommendations to the clinical director, in
accordance with the procedures described in section
541.9
of this
